scripts.build-mockup: rm -r build && cp src/redux/apis.mockup.js src/redux/apis.js && react-scripts build && cp src/redux/apis.local.js src/redux/apis.js
scripts.build-prod: rm -r build && cp src/redux/apis.prod.js src/redux/apis.js && react-scripts build && cp src/redux/apis.local.js src/redux/apis.js
scripts.deploy-mockup: cp s3-bucket-policy_mockup.json s3-bucket-policy.json && aws s3 sync build/ s3://bbbmockup
scripts.deploy-prod: cp s3-bucket-policy_production.json s3-bucket-policy.json && aws s3 sync build/ s3://appblockbyblock
